title: Diamond Dewdrop Mangalsutra - A Modern Take on Tradition
materials: Sparkling Cubic Zirconia (CZ) Stones with Brilliant Cut
features: Delicate rose gold chain interspersed with traditional black beads. Features teardrop-shaped CZ pendants evenly spaced, offering a modern and elegant twist on the classic Mangalsutra design. Lightweight and comfortable for everyday wear.
description: A contemporary Mangalsutra that respects tradition while offering a stylish and modern aesthetic. Crafted with high-quality materials for lasting shine and durability. Lightweight and comfortable for daily wear, making it a perfect symbol of your marital bond. Affordable elegance.
